name: narratively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the act of telling a story or describing a series of events: His latest film is a narratively complex drama. The information was presented both narratively and in a table.
More examplesFewer examplesThis is a narratively ambitious film, with an excellent central performance.The series is both visually exciting and narratively sophisticated.Crime is a narratively rich area for authors.The aim of this review is to narratively summarize the research literature in this field of study.This is probably her most narratively conventional novel.
